title: Zaffron Kitchen East Coast Family Restaurant
blurb: North Indian cuisine with a chic cosmopolitan setting.
description: Zaffron Kitchen East Coast features a contemporary interior design that gives visitors a welcoming and relaxed feeling. It has a children’s play corner and a myriad of Indian dishes to suit every craving. There is also a live show kitchen where customers can see the tandoor chef at work. The restaurant supports the nation’s movement towards healthier dining. Only certified healthier oil and low sodium salt are used. No MSG is added. The restaurants also feature kids-eat-free meals for children under 8 years old. Perfect for families.

title: Zaffron Kitchen Great World Family Restaurant
blurb: North Indian cuisine with a chic cosmopolitan setting.
description: Zaffron Kitchen Great World is located in the city and has a more formal setting and private rooms for luncheon meetings & private parties. All Zaffron Kitchen outlets are available for parties and private events bookings. The restaurant supports the nation’s movement towards healthier dining. Only certified healthier oil and low sodium salt are used. No MSG is added. The restaurants also feature kids-eat-free meals for children under 8 years old. Perfect for families.

title: Zaffron Kitchen - North Indian Cuisine Dining
blurb: Enjoy North Indian cuisine in a chic setting.
description: Zaffron Kitchen offers delicious North Indian cuisine in a cosmopolitan setting. With outlets at East Coast Road, Great World, and Star Vista, each location provides a unique dining experience. The East Coast Road outlet features a children’s play corner and a live show kitchen. The Great World outlet offers a more formal setting with private rooms. All outlets are available for parties and private events. Zaffron Kitchen supports healthier dining with certified healthier oil and low sodium salt, and no MSG. Kids-eat-free meals are available for children under 8 years old, making it a family-friendly dining destination.

title: Zaffron Kitchen @ Great World
description: Zaffron Kitchen offers a vibrant dining experience with a focus on North Indian cuisine. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere, making it a suitable place for parents and kids to enjoy a meal together. The menu features a variety of dishes, including vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, catering to different dietary preferences. The ambiance is designed to be welcoming and comfortable for families.

title: Zaffron Kitchen @ Star Vista Family Dining
blurb: Enjoy North Indian cuisine in a family-friendly setting.
description: Zaffron Kitchen at Star Vista offers a delightful North Indian dining experience suitable for families. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere where both adults and children can enjoy a variety of flavorful dishes. The menu includes options that cater to different spice preferences, ensuring a pleasant meal for everyone. The ambiance is designed to be comfortable for families, making it a great choice for a casual meal or a special occasion. The restaurant is located within The Star Vista mall, providing convenient access and a family-friendly environment.

title: Zaffron Kitchen - Great World Family Restaurant
blurb: Family-friendly dining with Indian cuisine options.
description: Zaffron Kitchen at Great World offers a family-friendly dining experience with a focus on Indian cuisine. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere for families with children, featuring a diverse menu with options suitable for various palates. Enjoy a range of flavorful dishes in a comfortable setting, perfect for a family meal. The restaurant is known for its quality ingredients and authentic recipes, ensuring a memorable dining experience for all family members. The ambiance is designed to be relaxed and inviting, making it an ideal spot for families to gather and enjoy a delicious meal together. The staff are attentive and accommodating, catering to the needs of both adults and children. The restaurant also offers options for those with dietary restrictions, ensuring everyone can find something to enjoy. The location within Great World makes it easily accessible and convenient for families visiting the mall. The restaurant provides a great opportunity to introduce children to the flavors of Indian cuisine in a friendly and approachable environment.
